title: Weird bandwidth issue
body:
Recently I have started freezing for about 1-2 seconds every so often in game. My ping will spike up to about 300ms (technically 500 but it goes down instantly) after it happens and descend slowly. Things will look normal, ping will be normal, then I will freeze briefly, then everybody teleports to their actual positions. It has recently being getting so extreme that it means the difference between victories and losses. It could be a packet loss issue, routing issue or a personal wifi issue. Whatever it is, if anyone has experienced this or can tell me a suggestion, please speak up.

P.S I'm fairly certain it's not my firewall but you never know

Edit: I have found a section in Riot support that details my symptoms exactly. 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader

replies.body:
Sounds like packet loss to me. for sure, though as to the cause that's a bit harder to nail down. I'd recommend running through the connection guide and seeing if any of those steps can help you out. They fix most common issues like this so it's the best place to start if this isn't happening with anything else.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
